rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with kitchen and dining space, featuring a modern colonial design with Vastu-compliant placement ensuring the master entrance is south-east oriented. Includes ample natural light and ventilation.
Open-plan kitchen area designed with modern colonial aesthetics and efficient workflow. Incorporates necessary storage and counter space, aligned per Vastu guidelines.
Primary bedroom with adjoining spacious balcony facing north-east to harness auspicious energy as per Vastu principles. Colonial design with modern finishes and ample storage.
Secondary bedroom with a dedicated balcony facing south-west, maintaining privacy while ensuring proper energy flow. Colonial interior style.
Library space featuring comfortable seating and bookshelves. Positioned ideally to ensure quietude and optimal natural lighting from east or north as per Vastu.

openings.description: Colonial style main entrance located on the south-east side of the plot for optimal Vastu flow.
Multiple balcony access points from bedrooms, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Strategically placed windows in living area, kitchen, and library to ensure balanced light and air circulation.
